tool_description: API showing a live feed of news articles about Climate Change
name: Climate Change News Feed
title: Climate Change News Feed

api_list.name: Climate Change News Sources
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-news-feed1.p.rapidapi.com/sources"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-news-feed1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-news-feed1.p.rapidapi.com/sources"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-news-feed1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Individual Crypto News Source Articles
api_list.description: This endpoint will return only the articles from a specific source

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description: Only articles with titles including the search terms will be returned

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit the amount of returned articles

api_list.name: Climate Change News Feed
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all the most recent articles from all sources
